mapper.select: select task.tid,task.Task_name,task.Tscore,task.Tchapter,task.Tappendixes,course.Cno,course.Cname,question.Qtype types,sum(tdetail.Score) score,count(1) count from task,course,tdetail,question where task.Tid=#{tid} and task.Cno=course.Cno and tdetail.Tid=task.Tid and question.Qid=tdetail.Qid and tdetail.type=0 GROUP BY question.Qtype

select task.tid,task.Task_name,task.Tscore,task.Tchapter,task.Tappendixes,course.Cno,course.Cname,code.Qtype types,sum(tdetail.Score) score,count(1) count from task,course,tdetail,code where task.Tid=#{tid} and task.Cno=course.Cno and tdetail.Tid=task.Tid and code.Qid=tdetail.Qid and tdetail.type=1
select * from Question where Qid in (select Qid from Tdetail where Tid=#{tid} and type=0)
select * from code where Qid in (select Qid from Tdetail where Tid=#{tid} and type=1)
mapper.update: update tdetail set Qid=#{newQid} where Qid=#{oldQid} and Tid=#{tid}
mapper.delete: delete from tdetail where Qid=#{qid} and Tid=#{tid} and type=#{qtype}
mapper.update: update task set Tscore=(select sum(score) from tdetail where Tid=#{tid} GROUP BY Tid) where Tid=#{tid}
mapper.select: select s.Qid,s.Sanswer,s.Score as grade,q.Qtype,q.Qcontent,q.Qchoice, q.Qanswer,q.Qdegree,t.Score from STdetail s LEFT JOIN Question q on q.Qid=s.Qid LEFT JOIN Tdetail t on t.Qid=s.Qid and t.Tid=(select Tid from Stask where id=#{id}) and t.type=0 where s.id=#{id}

select s.Qid,s.Sanswer,s.Score as grade,c.Qtype,c.Qdescribe,c.Qdegree,t.Score from stdetail_code s LEFT JOIN code c on c.Qid=s.Qid LEFT JOIN Tdetail t on t.Qid=s.Qid and t.Tid=(select Tid from Stask where id=#{id}) and t.type=1 where s.id=#{id}

select Stask.id,Stask.Grade,Stask.Sappendixes,s.Sno,s.Sname,s.Sclass,t.Task_name, t.Tchapter,Course.Cname from Sinformation s, Task t,Course,Stask where s.Sno=Stask.Sno and t.Tid=Stask.Tid and Course.Cno=t.Cno and Stask.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update stask set Grade=#{totalScore} where id=#{id}
update stdetail set Score=#{scores} where id=#{id} and Qid=#{qids}
update stdetail_code set Score=#{scores} where id=#{id} and Qid=#{qids}
update stask set Tstate="已批阅" where id=#{id}
